about.label: About Rhino Remodeler
about.title: Building Trust Since 2003
about.subtitle: Your Seattle Home Renovation Experts
about.storyP1: Rhino Remodeler was founded in 2003 with a simple mission: to provide Seattle homeowners with honest, quality home repair and renovation services they can trust. What started as a small operation with just two dedicated craftsmen has grown into one of the Puget Sound's most respected home improvement companies.
about.storyP2: Our founder, John Smith, began his career as a carpenter's apprentice at age 18. After years of working for large contractors and seeing how customers were often treated as just another job number, he knew there had to be a better way. He envisioned a company that would treat every home as if it were their own, combining old-school craftsmanship with modern techniques and genuine customer care.
about.storyP3: Today, that vision lives on in every project we undertake. From kitchen remodels that transform daily life to emergency repairs that save the day, our team of 15+ licensed professionals carries forward the same commitment to excellence that built our reputation over two decades ago.
about.missionText: To deliver exceptional home improvement services with integrity, quality, and care—building lasting relationships one project at a time while making Seattle homes safer, more beautiful, and more functional for the families who live in them.
about.teamSubtitle: The skilled professionals who bring your home improvement dreams to life
about.whySubtitle: What sets us apart from the rest

why.licensedDesc: Fully licensed, bonded, and insured for your complete peace of mind on every project.
why.experiencedDesc: 20+ years of combined expertise in home renovation and repair services.
why.qualityDesc: We take pride in every project, big or small, delivering work that stands the test of time.
why.transparentDesc: No hidden fees, clear quotes, and honest communication from start to finish.
why.satisfactionDesc: Your satisfaction is our top priority—we're not done until you're thrilled with the results.
why.localDesc: Seattle-based and community-focused, serving our neighbors with pride since 2003.

quality.guaranteeDesc: We stand behind every project with our satisfaction guarantee. If something isn't right, we'll make it right—no questions asked. Your complete satisfaction is our measure of success.
quality.warrantyDesc: All workmanship is backed by our comprehensive warranty—up to 5 years depending on the project. Plus, we honor all manufacturer warranties on materials and appliances.
quality.safetyDesc: Safety is never compromised. Our team follows strict OSHA guidelines, uses proper protective equipment, and maintains a clean, secure worksite throughout every project.
quality.environmentalDesc: We're committed to sustainable practices—recycling construction waste, using low-VOC materials when possible, and recommending energy-efficient options to reduce your environmental footprint.

about.communitySubtitle: We believe in giving back to the community that has supported us for over two decades.

community.habitatDesc: Our team volunteers regularly, helping build affordable housing for Seattle families in need.
community.seniorDesc: Discounted services for seniors, plus free safety inspections for qualifying homeowners.
community.localDesc: We partner with local suppliers and tradespeople, keeping our dollars in the Seattle community.

faq.q1: How does the quote process work?
faq.a1: After reviewing your submission, one of our specialists will call to discuss your project in detail. We may schedule a site visit if needed. You'll receive a comprehensive written quote within 24-48 hours.
faq.q2: What information will you need during the call?
faq.a2: We may ask about your preferred materials, timeline flexibility, access to the work area, and any specific design preferences. Having your project photos handy can be helpful.
faq.q3: How should I prepare for the site visit?
faq.a3: Clear access to the work area, have any relevant documents ready (permits, HOA requirements, previous work details), and prepare a list of questions for our specialist.

privacyPage.metaDescription: Privacy Policy for Rhino Remodeler. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information including our SMS messaging practices.
privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: Rhino Remodeler ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website (rhinoremodeler.com), use our customer portal, or interact with our services. Please read this policy carefully. By using our website or services, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

infoCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
infoCollect.description: We collect information that you provide directly to us, as well as information collected automatically when you use our services. Personal information we may collect includes:
items: Full name (first and last)
Email address
Phone number (including mobile number for SMS communications)
Home or property address
Project details and descriptions
Photos and images of your property or project areas
Payment information (processed securely through third-party payment processors)
Account credentials (for customer portal access)
infoCollect.autoCollect: We also automatically collect certain information when you visit our website, including:
autoItems: IP address and approximate geographic location
Pages visited, time spent, and navigation patterns

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
items: To provide, maintain, and improve our home remodeling and repair services
To process and manage your quote requests and project inquiries
To communicate with you about your projects, appointments, and account
To send you project updates, appointment reminders, and service notifications via email, phone, or SMS
To send marketing communications and special offers (only with your explicit consent)
To process payments and manage billing
To operate and improve our website and customer portal
To respond to your comments, questions, and customer service requests
To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

sms.title: 3. SMS/Text Messaging
sms.description: Rhino Remodeler offers SMS/text messaging services to provide you with project updates, appointment reminders, quote notifications, and promotional offers. By providing your mobile phone number and opting in, you consent to receive text messages from Rhino Remodeler.
items: Opt-in required: You must expressly consent to receive SMS messages from us. You may opt in by checking the SMS consent box on our quote request form, signing up through our website, or by texting a keyword to our number.
Message frequency: You may receive approximately 2-4 messages per month. Message frequency may vary based on your interactions with our services and active projects.
Message and data rates may apply. Your mobile carrier's standard messaging and data rates will apply to any messages you send or receive. Rhino Remodeler is not responsible for any charges incurred.
SMS messages may include: appointment confirmations and reminders, project status updates, quote notifications, promotional offers and discounts (with consent), and customer service communications.
sms.optOut: To opt out: You can stop receiving SMS messages at any time by replying STOP to any message you receive from us. After you send STOP, you will receive a one-time confirmation message, and no further messages will be sent unless you opt in again.
sms.help: For help: Reply HELP to any message for assistance, or contact us at (206) 487-9677 or francisco@rhinoremodeler.com. You may also text HELP to receive information about our SMS program.
sms.consent: Consent is not a condition of purchase. You are not required to consent to receiving SMS messages as a condition of purchasing any goods or services from Rhino Remodeler.
sms.noSharing: We do not share your phone number or SMS opt-in data with third parties or affiliates for marketing purposes. Your information is used solely for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. These technologies help us:
items: Essential cookies: Required for basic website functionality, such as maintaining your session and security
Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website, which pages are most popular, and how to improve the user experience
Functional cookies: Remember your preferences, language settings, and login information for convenience
Marketing cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and track the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns
cookies.manage: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may limit the functionality of our website.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We use the following third-party services to operate and improve our business:
items: Google Analytics: To analyze website traffic, user behavior, and improve our online experience. Google Analytics may collect information about your device and browsing activity. See Google's Privacy Policy for details.
Payment processors: We use secure third-party payment processors to handle all financial transactions. We do not store your full credit card information on our servers.
Twilio: We use Twilio to deliver SMS/text messages. Twilio processes your phone number and message content to facilitate delivery. See Twilio's Privacy Policy for details.
Supabase: We use Supabase for secure data storage, user authentication, and backend services. See Supabase's Privacy Policy for details.
thirdParty.note: These third-party services have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information, including:
items: SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmitted between your browser and our servers
Encrypted storage of sensitive data including passwords and payment information
Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
Access controls limiting employee access to personal information on a need-to-know basis
Secure backup procedures for data recovery
security.disclaimer: While we strive to protect your information, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security but are committed to protecting your data to the best of our ability.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
items: Access: You may request a copy of the personal information we hold about you
Correction: You may request that we correct any inaccurate or incomplete information
Deletion: You may request that we delete your personal information, subject to certain legal exceptions
Opt-out of marketing: You may opt out of receiving promotional communications at any time by clicking "unsubscribe" in our emails, replying STOP to SMS messages, or contacting us directly
Data portability: You may request your data in a commonly used, machine-readable format
Restrict processing: You may request that we limit how we use your information in certain circumstances
rights.howTo: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at francisco@rhinoremodeler.com or call (206) 487-9677. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.description: Our website and services are not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we discover that we have inadvertently collected information from a child under 13, we will promptly delete that information. If you believe a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately at francisco@rhinoremodeler.com.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, technology, legal requirements, or other factors. When we make material changes, we will notify you by updating the "Effective Date" at the top of this policy and, where appropriate, provide additional notice via email or a prominent notice on our website. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

termsPage.metaDescription: Terms and Conditions for Rhino Remodeler. Review the terms governing the use of our website, services, and SMS communications.
termsPage.title: Terms & Conditions
termsPage.intro: Welcome to Rhino Remodeler. These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the Rhino Remodeler website (rhinoremodeler.com), customer portal, and all related services provided by Rhino Remodeler ("we," "our," or "us"). Please read these Terms carefully before using our website or services.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using our website, creating an account, submitting a quote request, or using any of our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our website or services. We may update these Terms from time to time, and your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

services.title: 2. Services Description
services.description: Rhino Remodeler provides home remodeling, renovation, and repair services in the Seattle metropolitan area and surrounding regions within a 40-mile radius. Our services include, but are not limited to:
items: Home remodeling estimates and project consultations
Kitchen remodeling, bathroom renovation, roofing, electrical, plumbing, painting, flooring, and general repair services
Project management and coordination of home improvement projects
A customer portal for tracking quote requests, project status, and communication
Online quote request submission with photo upload capabilities
services.note: Service availability may vary based on location, project scope, and scheduling. We reserve the right to decline any project at our discretion.

estimates.title: 3. Estimates and Pricing
estimates.description: All estimates and quotes provided through our website or in person are intended for informational purposes and are subject to the following terms:
items: Estimates are non-binding until a formal written contract is signed by both parties
Quotes are typically valid for 30 days from the date of issue, unless otherwise stated
Final pricing may vary based on actual project conditions, material costs, permitting requirements, and scope changes discovered during the project
Any changes to the agreed-upon scope of work will be communicated to you and require written approval before additional work begins
Payment terms, schedules, and methods will be outlined in the project contract
We reserve the right to adjust pricing based on market conditions and material availability

sms.title: 4. SMS/Text Message Communications
sms.description: By providing your mobile phone number and opting in to receive text messages, you agree to the following terms regarding SMS communications from Rhino Remodeler:
items: You consent to receive recurring automated text messages from Rhino Remodeler at the mobile number you provided, including appointment reminders, project updates, quote notifications, and promotional offers
Message frequency: Approximately 2-4 messages per month. Frequency may vary depending on your active projects and service interactions
Message and data rates may apply as determined by your mobile carrier. Rhino Remodeler is not responsible for any messaging or data charges imposed by your carrier

SMS messages may include: appointment confirmations and scheduling reminders, project milestone updates and completion notifications, quote request status updates, seasonal promotions and special offers (with your consent), and customer service follow-ups
sms.optOut: To opt out of SMS messages at any time, reply STOP to any text message you receive from us. You will receive a single confirmation message acknowledging your request, and you will no longer receive messages from us unless you opt in again.
sms.help: For help or support with SMS messaging, reply HELP to any message, call us at (206) 487-9677, or email francisco@rhinoremodeler.com.
sms.rates: Message and data rates may apply. Check your mobile plan for details. Rhino Remodeler does not charge for SMS messages, but your carrier's standard rates apply.
sms.carriers: Compatible with most major US carriers including AT&T, Verizon, T-Mobile, Sprint, and others. Carriers are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages.

accounts.title: 5. User Accounts
accounts.description: When you create an account on our customer portal, you agree to the following:
items: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials (email and password)
You are responsible for all activity that occurs under your account
You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration and to update it as necessary
You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to or use of your account
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms or that are inactive for an extended period
You may delete your account at any time by contacting us. Upon deletion, we will remove your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy

ip.title: 6. Intellectual Property
ip.description: All content on the Rhino Remodeler website is protected by intellectual property laws. This includes:
items: All photographs, images, and videos of our completed projects are the property of Rhino Remodeler and may not be used without our written permission
Website design, logos, trademarks, and branding elements are owned by Rhino Remodeler
Written content, including blog posts, service descriptions, and marketing materials, is copyrighted by Rhino Remodeler
By submitting photos or content through our website (e.g., project photos for quote requests), you grant us a non-exclusive license to use those materials for providing our services to you
You may not copy, reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works from our website content without prior written consent

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.description: To the fullest extent permitted by law:
items: Rhino Remodeler's website and online services are provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied
We do not warrant that our website will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of harmful components
Rhino Remodeler shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of our website or online services
Our total liability for any claim related to our website or online services shall not exceed the amount you have paid to us, if any, in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim

This limitation of liability applies to the website and online services only. Liability related to physical remodeling and construction services is governed by the terms of your project contract and applicable Washington State law
Nothing in these Terms limits our liability for fraud, willful misconduct, or any liability that cannot be excluded by law

governing.title: 8. Governing Law
governing.description: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Washington, United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from or related to these Terms or your use of our services shall be resolved in the state or federal courts located in King County, Washington. You agree to submit to the personal jurisdiction of these courts.

changes.title: 9. Changes to These Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. When we make material changes, we will update the "Effective Date" at the top of this page and may notify you via email or a prominent notice on our website. Your continued use of our website and services after changes are posted constitutes your acceptance of the revised Terms. We encourage you to review these Terms periodically.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:
